model.name: grok
model.title: Grok
model.description: Unmarshal unstructured data to objects using Logstash based Grok patterns.
model.label: dataformat,transformation

pattern.description: The grok pattern to match lines of input

flattened.description: Turns on flattened mode. In flattened mode the exception is thrown when there are multiple pattern matches with same key.

allowMultipleMatchesPerLine.description: If false, every line of input is matched for pattern only once. Otherwise the line can be scanned multiple times when non-terminal pattern is used.

namedOnly.description: Whether to capture named expressions only or not (i.e. %{IP:ip} but not ${IP})

contentTypeHeader.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format if the data format is capable of doing so. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSON etc.
